id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this MCP23S17 component.

*See also: [MCP23S17 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp23Sxx.html#id1)*

deviceaddress.docs:
**int**: The address of the chip. Defaults to `0`.

*See also: [MCP23S17 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp23Sxx.html#id1)*

open_drain_interrupt.docs:
**boolean**: Configure interrupt pins to open-drain mode. Useful when the MCP23S17’s power supply is greater than 3.3 volts. Note that these pins will require pull-up resistors (to 3.3 volts) when this mode is enabled.

*See also: [MCP23S17 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp23Sxx.html#id1)*

cs_pin.docs:
**int**: The SPI chip select pin to use.

*See also: [MCP23S17 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp23Sxx.html#id1)*
